social-repurposer.description: Repurposes one content piece into LinkedIn, Twitter/X, Instagram, Facebook, Newsletter, and YouTube posts. Algorithm-first, Voice DNA injected, ContentStudio JSON + Markdown dual export.

content-calendar.description: Generates a full weekly content calendar for any Content Empire niche. Outputs ContentStudio bulk import JSON and human-readable CSV. Algorithm-optimized timing per platform.

voice-enforcer.description: Validates content against Tunde's 5-niche Voice DNA. Scores 0-100, flags violations with line-level fixes, blocks REJECT-level content. Auto-invoked on any content generation task.

hook-generator.description: Generates high-performing opening hooks for LinkedIn posts, newsletters, and threads. 8 hook types: data-shock, bold-claim, question, story-open, contrarian, how-to, framework, cultural. Scores each hook.

research-synthesizer.description: Multi-layer topic research and content brief synthesis. Searches news, data, expert takes, contrarian angles. Structures findings into niche-calibrated post angles with hook candidates.

newsletter-writer.description: Drafts newsletters for all 5 niches across ConvertKit, Beehiiv, Substack, and ContentStudio. Applies niche Voice DNA. Handles API posting or Markdown export depending on platform.

linkedin-post-writer.description: LinkedIn-specific post drafting with hook, body, and CTA. Enforces character count, line break formatting, and hashtag placement. Voice DNA injected per niche. Generates 3 hook variants.

seo-optimizer.description: SEO optimization for LinkedIn articles, newsletters, and long-form posts. Keyword extraction, meta description generation, internal link opportunities, readability scoring. Niche-calibrated keyword sets.

hashtag-strategist.description: Niche-specific hashtag strategy for LinkedIn, Instagram, and Twitter. 3-tier sets (niche + topic + broad). Platform-calibrated counts. Avoids banned, oversaturated, and off-brand tags.

analytics-summarizer.description: Weekly analytics brief from ContentStudio, LinkedIn, Instagram, or Twitter export data. Per-niche benchmark scoring, format breakdown, timing insights, competitor analysis, and 4 next-week recommendations.
